Class FreeTypeSkinLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.assets.loaders.AssetLoader<T,​P>
      • com.badlogic.gdx.assets.loaders.AsynchronousAssetLoader<com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin,​com.badlogic.gdx.assets.loaders.SkinLoader.SkinParameter>
        • com.badlogic.gdx.assets.loaders.SkinLoader
          • com.github.exformatgames.defender.utils.FreeTypeSkinLoader
  • public class FreeTypeSkinLoader
extends com.badlogic.gdx.assets.loaders.SkinLoader
    An AssetLoader to load a FreeTypeSkin. This enables you to deserialize FreeType fonts from a Skin JSON and load it through an AssetManager. See the Skin Composer documentation.
